name: Falling Hero !
description:
One goal: bring down your hero as far as you can! How far will you go?

Tap to drop your hero from platform to platform. Beware of deadly pikes!
Target highlighted areas to get perfect shots and win bonus points.

Land on platforms with coins to get them and unlock new heroes!
Accomplish missions to unlock new themes.

Challenge your friends to find out who has the best score!

Try now for FREE!

Game features:
◉ Free
◉ Easy gameplay (tap)
◉ Endless gameplay
◉ Suitable for all ages
◉ Offline friendly

Crafted with love under the sun of Montpellier and the freshness of French Alps by Pixel Rocket game studio.
